text: Do You Want the Truth or Something Beautiful? is a music album. It is the first one by English singer-songwriter Paloma Faith. It was released on 28 September 2009 by Epic Records. Its first two singles from the album are "Stone Cold Sober" and "New York". Both peaked within the top twenty in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ===B-sides=== The following tracks were not released on the album, but have been released as a single B-side. * signifies a co-producer == References == Category:2009 albums Category:Paloma Faith albums
title: Do You Want the Truth or Something Beautiful?
